p: Omega-6 and omega-3 fatty acids play an important role in cardiovascular disease and health. Conversion of omega-6 fatty acids like LA to arachidonic acid and the conversion of omega-3 fatty acids to DHA and EPA is a process driven by the same enzymes. Therefore, the conversion of ALA will depend on the amount of ALA and LA ingested, but not their ratio [ 64]. While LA is easily converted to arachidonic acid, ALA conversion to EPA and DHA is 1% and 5% respectively [ 65].
